title: Ethereum Cat Herders Meeting #105
body:
## Date and Time

March 28, 2023 at 15:00 UTC

## Location 

Join Zoom Meeting
https://us02web.zoom.us/j/84834303064?pwd=YTVDNUxvSjEzL1VTOXNoNmI1a2RlZz09
Video at YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A


## Agenda

New users on ECH Discord and/or contributor's introduction

### 1. Ethereum network upgrades
 - [Shanghai](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/shanghai.md) & [Capella](https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/tree/dev/specs/capella)
    - [Mainnet Shapella Announcement](https://blog.ethereum.org/2023/03/28/shapella-mainnet-announcement) & Tim's [Tweet Thread](https://twitter.com/TimBeiko/status/1640722906744487936)
    - [Shapella Watch Party Livestream](https://youtu.be/BVq1pz3FrDo)
    - [Lionel](https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/releases/tag/v1.3.0-rc.5) released on March 20th
    - Withdrawal Mainnet Shadow Fork 3 is planned 
    - Shapella [bug bounty](https://ethereum.org/en/bug-bounty/)
    - [Shanghai page](https://www.ethereumcatherders.com/shanghai_upgrade/index.html) at ECH website
    - Shapella upgrade [5things to know](https://www.coindesk.com/videos/recent-videos/ethereums-shanghai-hard-fork-5-things-to-know/)
    - ETH Withdrawal [explainer video](https://etherworld.co/2023/03/25/eth-withdrawals-everything-you-need-to-know/)
- Cancun & Deneb upgrade
  - EIP-4844 Implementers [Video for meeting](https://youtu.be/vQGk9FDs_CM)
  - EOF Devnets Implementers Meeting [Recording 10](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=avNum0JDdOE)
 - Naming of Post-Deneb CL Upgrade - [FEM Discussion](https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/e-star-name-for-consensus-layer-upgrade-after-deneb/13248), Tim's [Twitter poll](https://twitter.com/TimBeiko/status/1638971921168756736?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1638971921168756736%7Ctwgr%5E5ab8065d65a250499d34f6bd8f93fdb5158cb7c6%7Ctwcon%5Es1_&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fetherworld.co%2F2023%2F03%2F25%2Freadiness-of-the-capella-upgrade%2F)

### 2. Events, Fellowship, Hackathon
- [Next Billion Fellowship Cohort 3](https://blog.ethereum.org/2023/03/16/fellowship-cohort-3-applications) - submit your application by April 28, 2023
- [ETHBoston](https://www.ethboston.xyz/) April 29-30, 2023
- [Coindesk's Consensus Protocol Village](https://consensus.coindesk.com/speakers/) April 26-28, 2023
- [Scaling Ethereum](https://ethglobal.com/events/scaling2023) (ETHGlobal) virtual - Mar 10-29
- [Ethereum Rio](https://www.ethereumbrasil.com/ethereumrio)- Mar 28-30 
- [Edcon](https://edcon.io/) Vienna- Apr 3-6
- [NFT NYC](https://www.nft.nyc/) - Apr 12-14 
- [ETHGlobal Tokyo](https://tokyo.ethglobal.com/) - Apr 14-16
- [ETHZurich](https://ethereumzuri.ch/) conference -Apr 14-16
- [EthTaipei](https://eth-taipei.notion.site/ETHTaipei-2023-7aba2e9b4d264385ad26cb926639ed3a) hackathon - Apr 21-23& [EthTaipei](https://eth-taipei.notion.site/ETHTaipei-2023-7aba2e9b4d264385ad26cb926639ed3a) conference - Apr 24-25 

### 3. New initiative/association
- [EIP authors Survey](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSd3BX3j57iMu8yFlrOJGHCut0KfSZEwxCDdIiL5HW0gHNAEDQ/viewform)
- Client Diversity [[Survey Report](https://medium.com/ethereum-cat-herders/exploring-ethereums-client-ecosystem-afc9affa84dd)] & [Announcement](https://medium.com/ethereum-cat-herders/client-diversity-on-ethereum-network-3854b5c3c95f) 
- ERC-4337 Telegram integration
- Any new ideas for community engagement?

### 4. General updates/discussion
- ECH Meeting at 14:00 UTC
- Cancun - Deneb page at [ECH website](https://www.ethereumcatherders.com/)
- ECH Stats.
    - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/EthCatHerders) - 6458 Followers
    - [Discord](https://discord.io/EthCatHerders) - 1670 users
    - [YouTube](https://studio.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A) - 2920 subscribers
    - [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/ethereum-cat-herders/) - 264 Followers
- [ECH engineering](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues/266) 
  - [EIPw](https://github.com/ethereum/eipw/issues)
  - Learn2Earn [App](https://l2e.ethereumcatherders.com/), [GitHub](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/L2E)
- ECH Operations 
   - ECH GitHub backup & [YouTube backup](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/ECHBackup)
   - [ECH Podcast](https://open.spotify.com/show/7dgxKMkSyy3HWtQW7OfqXA)
- [EIPs Insight](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/EthereumImprovementProposalsInsight) WIP [EIPsInsight website](https://eipsinsight.com) 
- [PEEPanEIP](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxqu0PKKyMzG_3BJV_xZTi1F)  
    - Upcoming meetings can be found on [PEEPanEIP schedule](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/projects/2)

- [Meeting notes](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1axM1KaKc-GCcoPbAnYTOhgLnxXsBVoO5XRjTN3CLnck/edit#gid=0) and action items for ECH 
  - All Core Dev Execution [Notes 157](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/pull/750)
  - All Core Dev Consensus [Notes 105]
  - EIPIP [meeting 77](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/pull/223)
  - EIP Editing Office Hour Meeting 13 [Recording](https://youtu.be/bWOLcvDZQFQ) & Meeting 14 [Agenda](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/222)

### 5. Review of outstanding action items from previous ECH meetings
- Meeting [104]

#### The date for the next meeting is April 11, 2023

 (If anything else, leave a comment.)
I'd like to see if it's possible to move the meeting earlier by one hour for the duration of Daylight Savings Time - it would be personally beneficial to me to avoid a meeting conflict that I have

### Summary

- A proposal to split the ECH meeting recording into two videos 
  - Ethereum community update
  - ECH meeting
 Next step: Explore more on the proposal, and bring it to the next meeting with option  
- ECH Meeting time changed to 14:00 UTC effective ECH meeting 106
- Create a new page for Dencun  - Deneb+Cancun upgrade
